mapper.insert:
insert into sms_flash_promotion_session (`name`, start_time, end_time, `status`, create_time) values
(#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.startTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{item.endTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into sms_flash_promotion_session
id,
`name`, start_time, end_time, `status`, create_time,
values
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
on duplicate key update
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
